content.text: Jacob loves living at the edge. He has broken several bones and has put his life at risk plenty of times but he says he wouldn't change anything he has done. He has jumped from an airplane, of course with a parachute, he has climbed very steep mountains, swam with sharks, indeed he likes the adrenaline.
content.name: Knyb

content.text: In his last adventure he went bungee jumping. Only this time he set up a new challenge for himself: he had to jump from a very tall bridge, from a clift and from a very tall building, all in 1 day!
content.name: 3Ovd

content.text: To achieve this, he had to make all the preparations 3 days prior to his feat. He had to make sure all the ropes and structures were installed properly, and he supervised every single aspect of it. He says that, if something was to go wrong, nobody was to be blamed but himself, and so far, nothing has. He made all 3 jumps without any problem, he could record them and now they are part of his archive of achievements. That's why he is called: Extreme Jacob.
